en-US.summary: Voice assistant for NEXUS government contracting system
examplePhrases: Alexa, tell ALEXIS NEXUS to create opportunity
Alexa, ask ALEXIS NEXUS to add contact John Smith
Alexa, ask ALEXIS NEXUS what's my status
en-US.name: NEXUS ALEXIS
en-US.description: Manage your government contracting opportunities, contacts, and projects with voice commands through your NEXUS system.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Say 'Alexa, open ALEXIS NEXUS' to start managing your government contracting system.
